review: Incredibly simple to set up and it works great.  Combined with our Amazon Prime account this has saved us the cost or rentals and trips to red box.  I really like who it automatically loads on to the TV when I hit the home button, without having to a different line in when I want to watch a movie or video.  Great product.
author: Robert G. Samples "saluki bob"

review: I enjoyed the fire tv. But it keeps giving me a message saying low storage. I Just Bought This Thing. I can't even watch a movie without seeing the message at least 6 times it more.
author: Bob

review: Easy to install,  excellent picture quality and  works fast without any buffering despite a less than perfect wireless signal. Great variety of overall content to choose from  and the free content offered to Prime Members makes this a winner.
author: Kevin P Coughlin

review: Very easy to set up and very easy to use. The remote control is amazingly simple to use.
